span_48: Mayo Clinic School of Graduate Medical Education
p_65: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_69: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_82: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_100: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_103: The diagnostic radiology residency program at Mayo Clinic, Rochester, MN is an outstanding opportunity to work with 220 faculty interpreting over one million exams per year at a world renowned medical center. Program pays for one attendance meeting in addition to accepted presentations at scientific meetings. Residents have the option to rotate to the Phoenix Children's Hospital and to attend the AIRP with a travel stipend. Residents are given three paid fellowship interview days.

p_362: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
